close_door.description: Close the door of the microwave by swinging it to a closed position.

open_door.description: Open the door of the microwave by swinging it to an open position.

close_door.description: The door of the microwave is already closed. No action is necessary.

press_button.description: Press the button on the microwave.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob on the microwave.

rotate_tray.description: Rotate the tray inside the microwave.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the body of the microwave to remove dust, stains, or any other particles.

clean_microwave_door.description: Clean the door of the microwave to ensure clear visibility inside the microwave.

clean_microwave_tray.description: Clean the rotation tray of the microwave to ensure it is hygienic for placing food on it.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including its body, door, button, knob, and rotation tray.
